Trustee_16.name: Robert Miller
Trustee_16.content: The rejection of my allocation plan by Liam OConnor has further confirmed my low reputation in the investment community. This incident reflects my ongoing struggles with establishing trust due to previous rejections and indicates a perception of incompetence in my ability to propose equitable and transparent plans. Acknowledging the need for improvement, I must focus on enhancing clarity and fairness in future proposals to potentially rebuild trust and gain acceptance from investors. My acceptance rate remains critically low, further highlighting my current challenges as a trustee.
